Content: Former Minister Prof. G.L. Peiris has been summoned to Criminal Investigation Department (CID) a short while ago to record a statement regarding the comments he made on the recovery of cache of explosives in Marawanpulay, Chavakachcheri on last Wednesday. Prof. G.L. Peiris made a remark on the incident adding the event cannot be an isolated episode, at a press conference convened by the Joint Opposition in Colombo on the same day.
